forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 2C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 38F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 50F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low -2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 31F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High around 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 52F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 41F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low around 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening turning to all snow late. Low -1C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early with snow late. Low 33F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low near -10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 17F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will give way to lingering snow showers overnight. Low -9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 17F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low -12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 12F. Winds light and variable.
